column2: "Hello, <%me>. Was there something you wanted to talk to me about?"
"My relationship with Hadred? Why are you interested in something like that?"
"That kind of inquisitiveness might just be the death of you. Still, I'll tell you."
"Hadred and I were both occupied with missions."
"Although, Hadred wasn't exactly part of ARKS."
"That was normal for me, so I never thought anything about it. But I've seen another Dragonkin in ARKS besides him."
"But Hadred has been with me since he was in his larva stage, so I supposed he's never been with the Dragonkin."
"What exactly? I think it's obvious by seeing him."
"He's a dragon who was raised with me from a young age. That's everything I know about Hadred."
"Hadred has always been with me, but doesn't talk. So I have no idea of exactly what he's thinking."
"I don't know the reason for his betrayal. I really don't know anything."
"I don't even know what I mean to him."
